It also won the Healthy Drink and Vegetarian Snack at The Women’s Running Product Awards 2019 and 2020, it was shortlisted for the Great British Food Awards in 2019, and it was featured in Forbes as No 2 Healthy Vegan Food & Drink January 2021, in Tatler in 2019 and in The Resident London in January 2021.

Ready to try it? Use the code Deal now to take advantage of this special offer. Here are just some of 80Noir Ultra’s features and benefits:

  • It’s vegan, gluten and palm oil-free, and because it’s a mini bar, it means you can have a daily dose. Each bar is made of 13.5g of pure chocolate, which you can eat or use to make a hot chocolate. It’s 79.3% dark chocolate but it doesn’t have the same bitterness you find with other dark chocolates, so even milk chocolate lovers who want a great quality chocolate will enjoy it.
  • Benefits: Because 80Noir Ultra is made from pure chocolate, it boasts a high cacao percentage, antioxidants, fibre, magnesium, potassium and serotonin, which can help improve your physical and mental wellbeing, so you really will feel great with every bite!

  • Wellbeing: Dark chocolate can help reduce anxiety and stress levels due to its mood-boosting serotonin, making this a great soothing, calming snack.

Ingredients: 79.3% minimum of cocoa: cocoa mass; cocoa butter; sugar; emulsifier; soya lecithin; natural vanilla flavouring.
